rom: Han yeoreumnarui taeyangcheoreom tteugeowojin my heart
Teong bieotdeon maeiri seollemeuro kkwak cha
Ja, mworeul halji tto eodiro galji
Utgo inneun uriga boil geot gata
Mak seolleneun mam, jamdo an wa
Bamsaedorok talk, talk, talk, talk, talk
Deo sangsanghaebwa jeulgeoul geoya, can't stop
Have a good time, have a good time
Hanappunin chueogeul saegil geoya, high five
Mak seolleneun mam, jamdo an wa
Bamsaedorok talk, talk, talk, talk, talk
Saehayan pado, ppeong ttulrin haneul, ssodajin byeolkkaji
Nun gamji anko bol su inneun nal
Nun kkamppakamyeon huk jinabeorineun i sigani aswiwo
Meori wien star, star, star, star, star
Neowa na hamkkehae, on my weekend
han: 한 여름날의 태양처럼 뜨거워진 my heart
텅 비었던 매일이 설렘으로 꽉 차
자, 뭐를 할지 또 어디로 갈지
웃고 있는 우리가 보일 것 같아
막 설레는 맘, 잠도 안 와
밤새도록 talk, talk, talk, talk, talk
더 상상해봐 즐거울 거야, can't stop
Have a good time, have a good time
하나뿐인 추억을 새길 거야, high five
막 설레는 맘, 잠도 안 와
밤새도록 talk, talk, talk, talk, talk
새하얀 파도, 뻥 뚫린 하늘, 쏟아진 별까지
눈 감지 않고 볼 수 있는 날
눈 깜빡하면 훅 지나버리는 이 시간이 아쉬워
머리 위엔 star, star, star, star, star
너와 나 함께해, on my weekend
eng: [Verse 1]
This weekend, I've been waiting for you every day
My heart is hot like the sun on a midsummer day
Even an ordinary day is a special day
Our own holiday that we will never forget
How to pack clothes (Dress code!)
Check the weather first (Checklist!)
Even if I stay still, my heart keeps getting excited
Every day that was empty is filled with excitement
[Pre-Chorus]
Now, imagine what you will do
Where you will go (Right away!)
I think I can see us smiling
Over the date we picked
[Chorus]
Checklist, with our own feel
Leave all your worries behind
My heart is fluttering, I can't even sleep
Talk, talk, talk, talk, talk all night long
I got all my sunglass and sunscreen
I filled out my schedule plan too
A special weekend to fill
Wait and wait every day, ooh-woah-ooh-woah
[Verse 2]
Let's start on a long night and see the morning
Do you like the colored sunset?
Imagine more, it will be fun, can't stop
More freely, get, set, go!
Turn off the map app in your phone
And  go to the place where your footsteps lead
Have a good time, have a good time
I will engrave the one an only memory, high-five
[Pre-Chorus]
Even if it rains, even if its cloudy
I think I'll laugh right away (Right away!)
When the raindrops fall
Let's run through the rain without an umbrella
[Chorus]
Checklist, with our own feel
Leave all your worries behind
My heart is fluttering, I can't even sleep
Talk, talk, talk, talk, talk all night long
I got all my sunglass and sunscreen
I filled out my schedule plan too
A special weekend to fill
Wait and wait every day, ooh-woah-ooh-woah
[Bridge]
Even the white waves, the open sky and the pouring stars
The day I can see without closing my eyes
It's a pity that this time passes by in the blink of an eye
I want to enjoy every moment without gaps (brrrrr-ah)
[Chorus]
Checklist, with our own feel
Leave all your worries behind
On a night that covers the moonlight and sleeps
Above my head star, star, star, star, star
I got all my sunglasses and sunscreen
I filled out my schedule plan too (Right now)
Our short weekend (Yeah, oh yeah)
Wait every day, ooh-woah-ooh-woah
[Outro]
Waiting for the weekend
It's always a fun imagination, having fun
I want to enjoy as much as I want
You and me together, on my weekend
